# 2022-02-28

# Standup

...

## Extras

* https://lifeitself.us/2022/02/09/community-gathering-sprint-march-2022/ - reduce duplication and make even simpler
* https://lifeitself.us/2022/02/01/cultivating-an-emerging-paradigm/
  * Make sure all images in media library
  * footnotes as footnotes (wordpress supports this)
  * 2nd footnote missing
